thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials
Class MeshBasicMaterial

java.lang.Object
  thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials.Material
      thothbot.parallax.core.shared.materials.MeshBasicMaterial
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasColor, HasEnvMap, HasFog, HasLightMap, HasMap, HasMaterialMap, HasSkinning, HasSpecularMap, HasVertexColors, HasWireframe
public class MeshBasicMaterial
extends Material
implements HasMaterialMap, HasWireframe, HasFog, HasVertexColors, HasSkinning

A material for drawing geometries in a simple shaded (flat or wireframe) way.

The default will render as flat polygons. To draw the mesh as wireframe, simply set setWireframe(boolean) to true.

Author:
thothbot
